aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Executive Officers and Directors as of January 29, 2025
Jeffrey P. Bezos is the Executive Chair of Amazon.
Jeffrey P. Bezos is 61 years old.
Andrew R. Jassy is the President of Amazon.
Andrew R. Jassy is the Chief Executive Officer of Amazon.
Andrew R. Jassy is 57 years old.
Matthew S. Garman is the CEO of Amazon Web Services.
Matthew S. Garman is 48 years old.
Douglas J. Herrington is the CEO of Worldwide Amazon Stores.
Douglas J. Herrington is 58 years old.
Brian T. Olsavsky is the Senior Vice President of Amazon.
Brian T. Olsavsky is the Chief Financial Officer of Amazon.
Brian T. Olsavsky is 61 years old.
Shelley L. Reynolds is the Vice President of Amazon.
Shelley L. Reynolds is the Worldwide Controller of Amazon.
Shelley L. Reynolds is the Principal Accounting Officer of Amazon.
Shelley L. Reynolds is 60 years old.
David A. Zapolsky is the Senior Vice President of Amazon.
David A. Zapolsky is the Global Public Policy and General Counsel of Amazon.
David A. Zapolsky is 61 years old.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Developers and Enterprises/Executive Officers and Directors/

text:
#### Executive Officers and Directors

The following tables set forth certain information regarding our Executive Officers and Directors as of January 29, 2025:

| Name                  | Age | Position                                                               |
| --------------------- | --- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Jeffrey P. Bezos      |  61 | Executive Chair                                                        |
| Andrew R. Jassy       |  57 | President and Chief Executive Officer                                  |
| Matthew S. Garman     |  48 | CEO Amazon Web Services                                                |
| Douglas J. Herrington |  58 | CEO Worldwide Amazon Stores                                            |
| Brian T. Olsavsky     |  61 | Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer                      |
| Shelley L. Reynolds   |  60 | Vice President, Worldwide Controller, and Principal Accounting Officer |
| David A. Zapolsky     |  61 | Senior Vice President, Global Public Policy and General Counsel        |
